mapper.select: select a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL ,a.MEM_NICK MEM_NICK, a.MEM_JOIN_DATE MEM_JOIN_DATE, a.MEM_ROLE MEM_ROLE , b.MEM_QUIT_DATE from member a left join quit_member b on a.MEM_EMAIL=b.MEM_EMAIL
mapper.update: update member set mem_role=#{memRole} where mem_email=#{memEmail}
mapper.select: select diary_id, diary_mem_email, diary_title,diary_date,diary_views from diary
